name: ''Colonel danning'', X-cellent Hero
effect: Each time ''Colonel Danning'' earns a different glyph, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -1.

name: Anubis, Galactic Menace
effect: Failure: Incapacitate a team character.

name: Canopic Jar
effect: Stop an assigned adversary -- Place this gear on him. While this gear is on an adversary, he is blocked. When you fail a mission, destroy this gear.

name: Carson Beckett, Chief Medical Doctor
effect: While Carson Beckett is ready, he gets: "Pay 3 power, move a glyph from another character to Carson Beckett -- Ready that character."

name: Cronus, God of Fate
effect: Each time you would pay Cronus' revice cost, you may destroy another adversary instead. If you do, revive and ready Cronus.

name: Daniel Jackson, Linguistics Expert
effect: Finally! A TCG based on one of the most popular sci-fi franchises of all time! 200+ card set with 4 starter decks: Jack O'Neill, Samantha Carter, Teal'C, and Daniel Jackson. Players overcome obstacles and adversaries as they complete missions and earn glyphs. 6 foil ultra rares found in each box of boosters. Complete tournament support, including signed memorabilia from the stargate cast!

name: DHD
effect: Stop this gear, pay 4 power – Search your mission pile for a mission, shuffle the rest of the pile, then place that mission on top of it.

name: Hermiod, Engineering Specialist
effect: Stop Hermiod -- Ready a gear for each different glyph Hermiod has.

name: Iratus Bug
effect: Failure: Place this obstacle on a character. He is blocked, and his owner may perform this action: "Stop any number of other characters with a total of 3 SCI or more, or 3 ING or more -- Destroy this obstacle."

name: Jack O'Neill, Dynamic Leader
effect: [L] or [O]: Each assigned team character get combat+1 while Jack O'Neill is assigned. [G] or [O]: Each assigned team character get ingenuity+1 while Jack O'Neill is assigned.

name: Jack O'Neill, SGC Commander
effect: Each time an SGC character earns a glyph, if Jack O'Neill is ready, you may stop him. If you do, the next mission this turn gets difficulty -2.

name: Jay Felger, Scientist in the field
effect: Pay 1 power -- Move a glyph from Jay Felger to another character.

name: Kate Heightmeyer, Psychologist
effect: Stop Kate Heightmeyer, pay 3 power -- Choose a team character to get skills +1 until the end of the mission for each glyph he has.

name: Marshall Sumner, Senior Military Officer
effect: Each time another character earns a glyph Marshall Sumner has, you may pay 2 power. If you do, ready both of them.

name: Merlin, Dissenting Ancient
effect:
When you play Merlin he gets skills +2 until the end of the turn. Stop and destroy Merlin pay 3 power -- Choose a team character to get skills +2 until the end of the turn.

Hidden in stasis by Morgan le Fay Merlin was revived by SG-1. His body had deteriorated over the centuries but he had time enough to share his knowledge with the team.

name: Michael Ryan, U.S. Air Force Chief of Staff
effect: To assign Michael Ryan, pay 4 power and discard a card. While Michael Ryan is assigned, each assigned SGC character gets skills +1.

name: Oma Desala, Guide to Ascension
effect: While Oma Desala is assigned, each other assigned character gets skills +1.

name: Ori Mothership
effect:
Each time you assign this ship you may pay 2 power. If you do reveal your hand and gain 1 power for each Ori card in it. Victory: The current mission gets difficulty +1.

These mighty warships are among the most powerful the SGC has encountered.

name: Prometheus, The X-303
effect:
Each time you assign Prometheus you may pay 3 power. If you do ready a character who has a promotion token. Victory: Place a promotion token on a team character.

Sir we can't call it the Enterprise.

name: Ra, The Sun God
effect: System Lords, the next expansion for the Stargate TCG, is dialing your location! Over 200 new cards featuring great moments from Stargate SG-1. Enhance your favorite decks, and explore new teams, missions, and adversaries. Available this summer at your local retailer and for online play.

name: Ra, The Sun God
effect: Each time you assign Ra, you may discard any number of cards. If you do, draw the same number of cards.

name: Skaara, Hero of Abydos
effect: While Skaara is assigned, he gets: "Stop Skaara -- Ready another character."

name: Teal'c, Enemy of the Goa'uld
effect: [O]: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal’c is assigned. [P]: Complications cost power +1 to play while Teal’c is assigned.

name: Thor, Asgard Ally
effect: Each time Thor earns a different glyph, you may pay 3 power. If you do, ready each other character who has a glyph matching it.

name: Trial by fire
effect:
When you play this obstacle, your opponent chooses an assigned team character. He is stopped.





FAILURE: Incapacitate the chosen character.

name: Vala Mal Doran, SG-1 Member
effect: Each other SGC tea, character gets skills +1 while Vala Mal Doran is assigned to a mission that has a glyph matching one of hers.

name: Young Jack, Loki's clone
effect: While an SGC team character is assigned, Young Jack get science+1, combat+1, and ingenuity+1. While Jack O'Neill is assigned, Young Jack get ingenuity+1.
